annonsrubrik: R&D Design Engineer to MedTech market leader in Hörby/Malmö
annonstext:
Are you passionate about new product development? Do you want to make a difference for people breathing, speaking and living through a stoma?

We are looking for a successful and enthusiastic Design Engineer with a great commitment to deliver on ambitious targets with short time-to-market for development efforts. You will be a key player in projects within new product development and improvements of current products. You will be contributing to all aspects of product development from defining of user needs to the final CE-marked product, launch and market feedback.

 

Main job responsibilities

• Participate in generating design requirements, prototyping and design implementation.
• Contribute to the collection, analysis and understanding of user- and business needs
• Translate user needs to new products
• Design verification and validation including Design of Experiments and development of test methods
• Cooperate with Production engineers to design for volume production
• Investigate and implement the use of new materials and technologies
• Responsible for generating test requirement matrices and procedures to verify the outputs.
• Apply human factor / usability and design validation process.
• Active member of a cross-functional team, engaging in meetings to review design, manufacturing procedures or quality related issues.
• Participate in risk management analysis and documentation.

 

Your qualifications & competencies

• You are a design engineer with some years of experiences within mechanical engineering or industrial design
• You are an Innovative but structured problem solver with the skill to translate user needs into real products You like to work in teams: At Atos - product development happens in cross functional teams
• You are skilled in CAD – at Atos we use Solid Works
• Experience from medical device development is an advantage, however, commitment and enthusiasm are more important.

 

 

Workplace and contact info
 The service is a full-time service located in Hörby, only 25 minutes via the E22 north of Lund.

Please send in your application in English or Swedish as soon as possible - we carry out continuous review of potential candidates. Last application date 2021-04-05.

For questions about the service, you are welcome to contact

FIRSTNAME LASTNAME
 Development Manager, Voice rehabilitation
  EMAIL 

 

We offer:

You will be part of an entrepreneurial, informal yet ambitious work environment in which international teams work together to continuously grow and develop the business. You are expected to contribute from day one, and you will have great opportunities to be challenged, to learn and develop your professional and personal competencies.

 

Join us and help people breathe, speak and live again

Atos Medical is a specialized medical device company for voice and pulmonary rehabilitation for cancer patients who have lost their voice box through cancer, and as a result live with a neck stoma, affecting their ability to breathe and speak.

 

At Atos Medical, we are all about making life easier for people living with a neck stoma. We design, manufacture and sell our entire core portfolio directly to leading institutions, health care professionals and users. With technologies built on decades of experience, and a deep understanding of our customers, we provide personalized care and innovative solutions.

 

Working at Atos Medical means working within a diverse, global organization with great opportunities to grow and learn from others. Our aspiration is to create a culture built on purpose, pride and sustainable growth. We believe that an open work environment, meaningful and challenging roles and development opportunities all contribute to employee engagement. We strongly believe that our best work is co-created. It is only when we build on each other's ideas, skills and experiences, within and across teams, that truly innovative products and solutions are created.

 

Atos Medical is a global leader with Swedish headquarters and more than 20 subsidiaries worldwide. We are committed to living our values: we listen – we inspire – we focus – we engage every day.
